text:
George Maxwell Alagiah (born 22 November 1955) is a British newsreader, journalist and television news presenter. He was born in Colombo, Ceylon.
Since December 2007, he has been the presenter of the "BBC News at Six" and has also been the main presenter of "GMT" on BBC World News since February 2010. He is also the main presenter for the "BBC Ten O'Clock News" since 2000.
In April 2014, Alagiah was diagnosed with colorectal cancer. In March 2018, he said his cancer was terminal.
